downloadTitle: Microsoft System Center Management Pack for Windows Server Network Load Balancing 2016 and above
downloadDescription: The Windows Server Network Load Balancing (NLB) Management Pack supports monitoring NLB clusters on Windows Server 2016 and above, including Windows Server Core installations.

downloadFile.name: Management Pack Guide for NLB 2016 and above.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/c/c/8/cc8d4937-583f-4f62-96cf-2d2342810a37/Management Pack Guide for NLB 2016 and above.docx

downloadFile.name: Microsoft System Center MP for NLB 2016 and 1709 Plus.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/c/c/8/cc8d4937-583f-4f62-96cf-2d2342810a37/Microsoft System Center MP for NLB 2016 and 1709 Plus.msi

detailsSection: The Windows Server Network Load Balancing (NLB) Management Pack provides discoveries, monitors, alerts, and warnings to help the operator understand the state of NLB clusters and NLB servers . The Windows Server NLB Management Pack can provide early warnings that an operator can use to proactively monitor the state of the NLB servers in the computing environment.
detailsSection_file_name: Management Pack Guide for NLB 2016 and above.docx
Microsoft System Center MP for NLB 2016 and 1709 Plus.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported SCOM versions
  • System Center Operations Manager 2016, 2019 and 2022
    • To check support of other SCOM versions and Operating systems, please refer links below:
    https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/system-center/scom/system-requirements?view=sc-om-2016#microsoft-monitoring-agent-operating-system
    https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/system-center/scom/system-requirements?view=sc-om-2019#microsoft-monitoring-agent-operating-system
    https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/system-center/scom/system-requirements?view=sc-om-2022#microsoft-monitoring-agent-operating-system
